useCase.name: Initialize Database
useCase.description: As a database manager, I want to initialize the database to maintain data integrity.

preconditions.precondition: The database table must be available.

mainSequence.step: dbmng checks if the table is available.
dbmng creates the database if the table is not available.
dbmng clears all data in the database if the table is available.
dbmng initializes the database from vpn.cvs.
